segments.text: I am going to give you an end-of-the-unit test this Friday . Please be prepared for it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you please tell us how to review our lessons ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Review all the lessons in this unit and see if you can understand the main idea of each lesson .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Phrases and sentence patterns are also very important . You should know how to use them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Should we remember all the new words and expressions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , I don't quite understand some difficult points in this unit . I wonder if you could help us to solve the problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . When you review your lessons , mark the places which you don't understand , then I will give you some coaching .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When shall we have a coaching period ?
segments.speaker: S2
